extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • observeByteStream

        public <any> observeByteStream()
        Observes byte from bluetooth's InputStream. Will be emitted per byte.
        Returns:
        RxJava Observable with Byte

      • observeByteArraysStream

        public <any> observeByteArraysStream(int size)
        Observes stream of bytes from bluetooth's InputStream and returns Observable of byte[]s.
        Parameters:
        size - internal buffer size
        Returns:
        the Observable containing read byte arrays from the InputStream

      • observeStringStream

        public <any> observeStringStream()
        Observes string from bluetooth's InputStream with '\r' (Carriage Return) and '\n' (New Line) as delimiter.
        Returns:
        RxJava Observable with String

      • observeStringStream

        Observes string from bluetooth's InputStream.
        Parameters:
        delimiter - char(s) used for string delimiter
        Returns:
        RxJava Observable with String

      • send

        public boolean send(byte oneByte)
        Send one byte to bluetooth output stream.
        Parameters:
        oneByte - a byte
        Returns:
        true if success, false if there was error occurred or disconnected

      • send

        public boolean send(byte[] bytes)
        Send array of bytes to bluetooth output stream.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if success, false if there was error occurred or disconnected

        Send string of text to bluetooth output stream.

        Returns:
